subNodes.conversationText: Bloodstaunch.  You have a good eye, <FirstName>.
There is a good amount here.  I will harvest a bit, but you are free to gather some as well.  A sprig can temporarily lend health to its user--but be careful, it wears off far too quickly!
[(Sleight of Hand) Attempt to harvest some of the bloodstaunch yourself.]
[You successfully harvest some of the bloodstaunch yourself.]
[<i>Gossam pokes among the bloodstaunch, searching for a pristine specimen, and eventually settles on one he likes, holding it up and looking at it with admiration.<i>]
Well, , we have found all of the plant specimens I'd set out to find. I knew it would be exciting, but I did not know how exciting. And now my little adventure has come to an end, I suppose.
In all honesty, these specimens pale in comparison to what finding them has meant to me. You, Vroman, and Ianth have proven yourselves to be true friends.
It is an honor to hear you say so, son of Sheela Peryroyl. [Ianth bows deeply, and clasps Gossam's hand warmly.]
I would have to agree, Gossam.  I hope this does not actually mean that you are through with us!
Indeed.  Your contribution to this party has been most valuable.
I am glad that you think so, <FirstName>.
I don't intend to go.  I feel as if we are a part of something larger than all of us--by Sheela Peryroyl, my path is with you.
I am glad, Gossam.  Let us continue on.
[Chuckling.] How could I be deaf to such an earnest entreaty?
The decision is yours, of course.  But I would like to see you stay.
The decision is mine, it's true.  And I believe I have decided.
[(Survival) Attempt to harvest some of the bloodstaunch yourself.]
[You successfully harvest some of the bloodstaunch yourself.]
[<i>Gossam pokes among the bloodstaunch, searching for a pristine specimen, and eventually settles on one he likes, holding it up and looking at it with admiration.<i>]
